resources.string:
Visits to hill stations can be full of fun and new experiences. Travelling is a great method to gain a lot of life experience and also meet new people. Every year, a large number of people travel all across the world. Some people travel to expand their knowledge, while others go to escape the daily hassle of their lives and take a break.
